name: Avatarg
description:
Avatarg generates a beautiful type of avatars for your app design prototype with one simple click.


How to use plugin:

1. 👤 Select one shape or multiple shapes.

2. 🎨 Style your avatar.

3. ✨ Generate.


---


Feel free to tag me on Twitter (@Yusof_Bz) I'd love to see what you made using Avatarg.


😃 You are also welcome to submit your ideas and suggestions:

✍️ https://avatarg.canny.io


Happy designing 👨🏻‍🎨.
